description:
3D CAD application

Dune 3D is a parametric 3D CAD application that supports STEP import/export, fillets and chamfers.
This is the fourth versioned release of Dune 3D
See the docs for installation instructions.
New features and major enhancements
See the docs for an illustrated overview of what's new compared to version 1.2.
A complete changelog that includes all enhancements and bugfixes is available in the repo.
- Bitmap picture import (0c3a0bd)
- Pipe groups (4cce3ca)
- Clone groups (1821909)
- Solid model operation group (9d95d64)
- Horizontal/Vertical mirror groups (e1c4ebb)
- Curvature combs for visualizing curvature (e244c3a)
- preview constraints on hover in context menu (2e37a8c)
- context menu for constraining (175ed27)
- Create coincident constraints tool (2a5398e)
- open selection menu on long click so that it also works in tools (6e7e391)
- don't forget collapsed state of bodies in workspace browser (95a2cd7)
- show keyboard shortcuts in action bar buttons tooltip (8bcf0c9)
- show keyboard shortcuts in context menu (0cfb6b4)
- drag items even if not selected (60816ba)
